==== A Little About Me ====
I learned about Ubuntu in 2007 from a PCWorld article praising 7.04. I decided to give it a try, and I have been hooked ever since. I am learning all I can about Linux and computers in general.

==== Projects/Groups I Am Involved In ====
* Developer for the <nowiki>[[http://keryxproject.org/|Keryx Project]]</nowiki>
* Member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/TennesseeTeam|Tennessee Ubuntu LoCo]]</nowiki>

==== My Skills/Knowledge ====

* Python

==== Testimonials ====
* I met mac9416 in person in May 2009 in Memphis, TN at a LoCo TN (West) meetup at the Memphis Pizza Cafe' on Madison Ave. My first impression was he is reserved but observant. Very involved with Python development and strong supporter of Ubuntu. -Rich Gray (netritious)
* mac9416 has been very active in our LoCo's artwork and web site development, he has played a vital role in our strong web presence. -- WesleyStout
